alert.note: Alert for Eastern San Miguel County; Northeast Highlands (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 21 at 12:31PM MST until February 21 at 6:00PM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Southwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph. * WHERE...Eastern San Miguel County and Northeast Highlands. * WHEN...Until 6 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs may be blown down. Expect strong cross winds on area roadways. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Hazardous cross winds expected on northwest to southeast oriented roads like Route 104 through central San Miguel County.
info.instruction: Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution.

area.areaDesc: Eastern San Miguel County; Northeast Highlands
